venue.address_2: If you do not read the write up- you loose out
venue.name: SEE DETAILS IN EVENT WRITEUP

item.description:
Saturday, November 19, 2011, 12:00 PM

SELECTED BY: AL-R

Rattling Snakes Mountain

120 Colt Highway, farmington, CT (map)

I will be wearing my ORANGE Snake Hunting Hat SELECTED BY: AL-R

Hi Everyone,

~RATTLE SNACKS~   MMmmm !

If You need some excersize to tone your BUTT or GUTT ---  here is a location that will be a good spot !!

-For me-->, -- it is Required that more excersize is needed in order to maintain my Tarzan Like Looks and Virility.

Dr.OZ says excersize will  increase my Fertility also (Your's too i am sure !) ----- This is one of the main reasons i post these HIKES--- its so i can father lots of babies, I am starting to work out RIGHT NOW !!!

The next time i post the "Purgatory Hike", i will be ready to have "Many Babies" with the Sexy Pretty Miss Devil since she was such an adorable tease and i will be ready to give up my Virginity to her Flaming Hot Desire.

http://www.meetup.com/Forever-Young/photos/4318422/70608672/

 

Wouldn't you like and have the desire to BBQ a few Tasty Rattle Snakes for a healthy meal before they go into hibernation ???  Their Cave is just one of the  FEATUREs along the way if you want to climb in and get a few.

Rattling Snakes taste just like Chicken so if i cut em up into little disk shapes for you and cook em up -- all you have to do then is *Close Your Eyes* and just think of them as Mack Donalds Chicken Nuggets while you gobble em up. The hunny barbieq sauce  is superb for dipping em.

Rattle Snackes however DO NOT make good hot dogs -- so forget the Mustard.

 

The END Destination is the "Viewpoint" above the quarry overlooking the great sights.

 

I plan to enjoy the view from the top for a while and enjoy the sun also there,  so its this location to have a "snacke" or did i spell it wrong ? "snake" ??, well whatever spelling, its eat something at this spot dead or alive while relaxing.

Pot Luck & Fire or other location will be discussed at the event.

 

Current Weekend Weather:http://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?site=box&FcstType=text&zmx=1&zmy=1&map.x=33&map.y=190&site=BOX

-------------------------------------------

Getting there: "ANGRY Rattling Snakes Cave":

 RT 6 entrance: GPS Use apx # 120 Colt Highway, Farmington to get you close enough.

From Hartford: Take I-84 WEST to exit # 38 for rte 6 WEST= Colt Highway

Follow Rte #6 for 2 miles untill you see a quarry on the left,

Go a bit further till you see a mountain access road on left that is gated off, go just a bit further till you see an area for pulling off the road in front of a fence on your left,

This is the parking area.  I will put an orange cone on my car trunk when i get there.

 

See those that are interested. al-r
item.how_to_find_us: I will wear my Bright Orange SNACKE Hunting Hat
